title: (x) 944 Magazine logo tech sans - Nasalization {Robert Farrelly}
content:
Hi I am hoping to find out what 944 magazine uses as their masthead/logo typeface. It is the 944 numerals.

The image is a little small here is the website as well, [http://www.944.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050101/http:/www.944.com/ "http://www.944.com/")

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/images_5486.jpeg)

 [‹ (x) The Wiz fun casual display sans - Square Milk {Ignacio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48065 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Script from WWD Accessories Magazine - OPLord Swash (Lys Calligraphic) {Tom Harpole (Mike F)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48064 "Go to next forum topic")
author: baconpress
